Bring it into your favorite debugger and have at it... (Eclipse has a
really nice one, second only to Visual Age for Java).  If you need the
sources they are there as well.

=jason

On Wed, 2002-07-24 at 01:48, omineo wrote: Hi,

Could anyone of you suggest me a best way to know how to step-in a 
sample test in JUNIT.

To be clear, it is like F7 in Turbo C.

My intention is to find the step wise run of a sample class in JUNIT.

Cheers,
Omineo
